title: Engage for Success Conference 2015
desc: The?Engage for Success conference for business leaders, Heads of Operations, and managers of large teams.  What must the UK develop to remain at the forefront of the global economy? How can we create sustainable business success with all our people? How do we need to change as leaders to accomplish this?  Discover and discuss with other business leaders why raising employee engagement is imperative to improving productivity and sustaining your business.  David MacLeod and Nita Clarke will set out the challenges that lie ahead for the UK in the next five to ten years. David Halpern from the Business Insights Team will be speaking about how improved employee engagement and behavioural insight can radically change how your organisation can innovate and change how it engages with its customers. Alex Edmans from London Business School will be discussing the financial impact of highly engaged staff in organisations, and how it can improve business performance and sustainability, employee wellbeing and social responsibility.  Find out what other organisations are doing through sector case studies.  EFS will be showcasing work on cross-cultural engagement in global organisations, how social media can breakdown traditional barriers to engaging with your staff, and why the strong links between employee engagement and well-being can benefit your company?s productivity.  Be part of new thinking and change your organisation as you change your understanding of how you need to lead your business over the next five years.
